column1: Borgil was a bright red star near the constellation of Menelvagor.
Tolkien fandom have suggested that Borgil might either refer to the star wikipedia:Betelgeuse or the star wikipedia:Aldebaran.
Basing her approach both on literary assumptions and astronomical evidences
column2: Prof. Kristine Larsen has argued that Borgil can be identified as Aldebaran.Kristine Larsen
column3: "A Definitive Identification of Tolkien’s `Borgil: An Astronomical and Literary Approach" in Tolkien Studies
